panels.description: All haproxy instances in this cluster ${cls}

Service map tells whether a server can be used as a specific service/role/svc.
e.g Offline marks this server can be used as offline server
panels.title: Route Matrix
Current total of incoming / outgoing bytes
Back - Current total of incoming / outgoing bytes
Front - Current total of incoming / outgoing bytes
Back - Total number of connections reuses
Front - Maximum observed number of connections per second
Back - Maximum observed number of active sessions and limit
Front - Maximum observed number of active sessions and limit
Back - Maximum observed number of sessions per second
Front - Maximum observed number of sessions per second and limit
Back - Total number of UP->DOWN transitions
Back - Total weight of the servers in the backend / Active servers backend
Back - Number of seconds since last session assigned to server/backend
Back - Total number of times a service was selected
Server - Current total of incoming / outgoing bytes
Server - Number of sessions per second and limit

targets.legendFormat: Total number of failed check {{ proxy }} / {{ server }}
Total number of UP->DOWN transitions {{ proxy }} / {{ server }}
Current throttle percentage for the server, when slowstart is active, or no value if not in slowstart {{ proxy }} / {{ server }}
Total number of times a service was selected {{ proxy }} / {{ server }}

panels.title: Server - Number of seconds since last session assigned to server/backend

targets.legendFormat: Total amount of memory allocated in pools (in bytes)
Total amount of memory used in pools (in bytes)
Current number of tasks in the run-queue
Non zero means stopping in progress
Maximum number of open file descriptors; 0=unset
Total number of failed pool allocations
Idle to total ratio over last sample (percent)
Current number of active jobs (listeners, sessions, open devices)
Current number of active jobs that can't be stopped during a soft stop
Current number of sessions per second over last elapsed second
Configured maximum number of sessions per second
Maximum observed number of sessions per second
Total number of requests (TCP or HTTP)
Current number of connections per second over last elapsed second
Configured maximum number of connections per second.
Maximum observed number of connections per second
Initial Maximum number of concurrent connections

panels.description: HAProxy log of instasnce $ins @ $ip from syslog

targets.expr: ip:$ip job:syslog (app:haproxy) | stats count() as count
ip:$ip job:syslog _msg:~"haproxy" NOT app:haproxy | stats by (app) count() as count

panels.title: HAProxy Log

targets.expr: ip:$ip job:syslog _msg:~"haproxy" NOT app:haproxy | fields level,unit,_msg

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls

list.description: Node name of current postgres instance
list.label: Node
list.name: node
